00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples

00035

00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void EXTI_Configuration(void);
00046 
00047 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00049   * @brief  Main program.
00050   * @retval None
00051   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00052 int main(void)
00053 {
00054   /* Initialize LEDs                                                                                        */
00055   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00056   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00057 
00058   EXTI_Configuration();
00059 
00060   #if 1
00061   /* Activate the corresponding EXTI interrupt                                                              */
00062   EXTI_SWIntCmd(EXTI_CHANNEL_0, ENABLE);
00063   #endif
00064 
00065   while (1)
00066   {
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  EXTI configuration.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 void EXTI_Configuration(void)
00075 {
00076   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00077     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00078     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00079     CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI = 1;
00080     CKCUClock.Bit.PB   = 1;
00081     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00082   }
00083 
00084   /* Configure AFIO mode of input pins                                                                      */
00085   AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PB, AFIO_PIN_0, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00086 
00087   /* Enable GPIO Input Function                                                                             */
00088   GPIO_InputConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_0, ENABLE);
00089 
00090   /* Configure GPIO pull resistor of input pins                                                             */
00091   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_0, GPIO_PR_UP);
00092 
00093   /* Select Port as EXTI Trigger Source                                                                     */
00094   AFIO_EXTISourceConfig(GPIO_PIN_NUM_0, GPIO_PB);
00095 
00096   { /* Configure EXTI Channel n as rising edge trigger                                                      */
00097 
00098     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00099        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00100        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00101     */
00102     EXTI_InitTypeDef EXTI_InitStruct;
00103     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Channel = EXTI_CHANNEL_0;
00104     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Debounce = EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE;
00105     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_DebounceCnt = 0;
00106     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_IntType = EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE;
00107     EXTI_Init(&EXTI_InitStruct);
00108   }
00109 
00110   /* Enable EXTI & NVIC line Interrupt                                                                      */
00111   EXTI_IntConfig(EXTI_CHANNEL_0, ENABLE);
00112   NVIC_EnableIRQ(EXTI0_IRQn);
00113 }
00114 
00115 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00116 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00117   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00118   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00119   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00120   * @retval None
00121   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00122 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00123 {
00124   /*
00125      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00126      Debug message can be added here.
00127      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00128   */
00129 
00130   while (1)
00131   {
00132   }
00133 }
00134 #endif
